subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! Senate Revives Immigration Reform
body:
The Senate has voted to jump-start a stalled immigration measure to legalize 
millions of unlawful immigrants.



Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details.
